M

main(String[]) - Static method in class Main
In the main method we instantiate the controller and start it, which causes all of our game to run.
Main - Class in <Unnamed>
This is the class that instantiates the controller and runs our game.
Main() - Constructor for class Main
 
Measure - Class in gameobject
The Measure class is used to represent both our Ruler and our Scale.
Measure(int, int, int, int, int, String) - Constructor for class gameobject.Measure
Default constructor for the Measure class.
model - package model
 
Model - Class in model
This is the abstract Model class which all the models extend, this includes attributes that every model must have like dimmensions, time, GameObjects, and CodeListener
Model(int, int, CodeListener) - Constructor for class model.Model
All of the subclasses call this constructor to set the base attributes
mouseClicked(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.CustomMouseListener
 
mouseDragged(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.CustomMouseListener
 
mouseEntered(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.CustomMouseListener
 
mouseExited(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.CustomMouseListener
 
mouseMoved(int, int) - Method in class model.ResearchModel
This will update the position of a tool if you are holding it as the mouse moves
mouseMoved(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.CustomMouseListener
 
mousePressed(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.CustomMouseListener
 
mouseReleased(MouseEvent) - Method in class controller.CustomMouseListener
